data.name: XSlidePreviewCacheListener
desc: Called when a slide preview has been created that was previously requested via a call to XSlidePreviewCache.getSlidePreview(). The implementor may then call getSlidePreview() a second time to get the up-to-date version of the preview.

methods.name: notifyPreviewCreation
desc: Called by a XSlidePreviewCache object when a preview has been created for the slide with the given index.
